content:
Nisem. Sej casta ga ampak ko sta oba v istem WIFI omrežju. Ko uporabiš podatke in  WIFI mrežo z telefona narediš, pa v aplikaciji T2go zgine ikona za castanje. Edit: Screen miroring ne najde Mi box s.

Zgleda da tudi android ne dela na ta način, ne sam iphone. Nimam sicer nobenega androida  doma da bi probal ampak google mi na hitro nekaj ven vrže

Chromecast requires a network; either WiFi or Ethernet if you buy the optional adapter.  It doesn't support mobile data directly.
 
If your phone will make a WiFi Hotspot, that's not a supported configuration, but, some people have reported that it works fine.
There is a trick... most phones can't BE the WiFi network and act like they are ON the network at the same time.
 
So, you will probably need another device

Turn on the WiFi hotspot on your phone to make a new network (note: this HAS to have full internet access)
Connect your other device to your phone hotspot
Use the other device to setup your Chromecast to use the phone hotspot
Use the other device to cast to your Chromecast
A couple more warnings... as I said, your hotspot has to have internet access.  Chromecasts require this even when you are casting local content.  Be warned that Chromecasts can use a LOT of data quickly.  Because of this, speed of connection is important.  Even if you have "unlimited data", some providers throttle phone data speeds when you do a lot of data. This will impact the quality of your casting or cause a lot of stutters.  And, of course, check with your phone-service provider to make sure there aren't additional charges for using a Hotspot (mine charges a LOT extra).

ctx: iPhone EON in predvajanje je na TV
content:
Ravnokar povezal Apple TV 4K na iPhone-ov hotspot in lahko BP nanj predvajam EON preko AirPlaya. Sem to varjanto večkrat koristil na poti že v preteklosti tudi že v času D3GO appa. Chromecasta pa nimam pri roki da bi probal. 

Vrjetno bi bilo pa vseeno za neko redno uporabo bolj priročno app vržt direktno na nek box. V fazi selitve še nisem imel fiksnega neta in sem uporabljal EON SmartTV app na MiBoxu, ki je bil ravno tako povezan na mobilni net. Sicer ne glih idealen box za EON ampak dela, edino število SmartTV naprav je v paketih bolj omejeno (običajno max 1 ali 2), kot mobilnih naprav. Teoretično lahko sicer sideloadaš tudi mobilni app, ampak rabiš potem miš za uporavljanje in ni garancije, da bo delalo.
